title: Has anyone transferred touchbar to another top case? A1706
message:
Hi, I have this A1706 that has some damage to the corners of the topcase and may need to be replaced. I found some top cases that have only a keyboard so I would need to transfer over the touchbar and everything else.
I was wondering how difficult it is to remove the touchbar from the original Macbook and transfer it to the new top case?

title: Has anyone transferred touchbar to another top case? A1706
